title: New Sports Illustrated Headline Font
content:
Sports Illustrated has begun using this font for all of its headlines. Anyone recognize it or anything similar? It seems to be similar to Matrix II (from the first beginner pop quiz), but not exact.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120113214432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SIfont_4594.jpg)
author: IronTaco
